item.title: Online News Prediction
item.description: Binary classification using sklearn pipeline, sequential feature selection, multiple algorithm comparison, hyperperameter tuning, and XGBoost | Objectives Through this project, I explore the following question: What features are best able to predict how often an online article will be shared? Data Set This dataset was acquired from the University of California, Irvine’s Center for Machine Learning and Intelligent Systems archive (https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Online+News+Popularity#). Data references articles published by Mashable (www.
